fields.name: MinReplicaSetSize
fields.description: The minimum replica set size as a number.

fields.name: QuorumLossWaitDuration
fields.description: The maximum duration for which a partition is allowed to be in a state of quorum loss, represented in ISO 8601 format (hh:mm:ss.s).

fields.name: ReplicaRestartWaitDuration
fields.description: The duration between when a replica goes down and when a new replica is created, represented in ISO 8601 format (hh:mm:ss.s).

fields.name: StandByReplicaKeepDuration
fields.description: The definition on how long StandBy replicas should be maintained before being removed, represented in ISO 8601 format (hh:mm:ss.s).

fields.name: TargetReplicaSetSize
fields.description: The target replica set size as a number.
